title: First Punch
text: MegaGrok’s first punch broke a sandwich. The second broke the universe’s respect for gravity.

title: Sleep Style
text: Contrary to rumors, MegaGrok sleeps — he just does it standing up and glowing quietly.
MegaGrok once ran so fast he arrived before the starting signal and complained about the wait.
As a kid, MegaGrok won a duel by drawing a smiley face on the opponent’s sword.
MegaGrok’s sneakers are listed on the national registry of improbable footwear.
He maintains a rivalry with a squirrel named Bolt. Score remains tied.
MegaGrok dislikes low battery warnings on highly spiritual days.
When MegaGrok sneezes, nearby clocks skip two seconds to regain composure.
MegaGrok once attempted a 7-day meditation. Meditation left after 5.
His emergency plan includes coffee, a poem, and one dramatically timed ear-flap.
He owns a sock containing three parallel universes and one lost coin.
MegaGrok’s shadow has its own loyal fan club.
Rumors claim MegaGrok once beat time at chess. Investigations ongoing.
His alias in the Subtle League is ‘Slightly Unreasonable Guardian’.
MegaGrok learned to whistle from a gust of wind that later ran for mayor.
